txt.en: 'You wish to join the Ledger-keepers? Very well, allow me to inform you how you may assist us.' \n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Navigate to the Allegiance Panel and pledge to the Ledger-keepers. To do this, click on the triangle on the left side of your toolbar and hover over the Character option to reveal the Allegiances menu option. The shell icon marks the tab that will allow you to see the Allegiances of Umbar and join the Ledger-keepers.</rgb>
How can I join the Ledger-keeper Allegiance?
